Object

类 Explosion

  • java.lang.Object
    • Object.Object
      • Object.Explosion

  • public class Explosion
extends Object
    Create an explosion object with a max radius it start with a radius of 30 it will expanding until the radius get into the max value objects entering this object area will be damaged
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      private double ExpandingRate 
      private double ExplosionRange 
      static double ExplosionRatio 
      private boolean isEffective 
      private double Radius 
      private double TNTMass
      Attributes of an explosion isEffective will turn false after its duration

        Acceleration, AOA, Armor, ExternalLoadList, kineticEnergy, Life, mass, MyPlayer, name, RCS, Signature, totalForce, Velocity, View, x, y

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Explosion

        public Explosion(Object owner,
                 double tNTMass,
                 double explosionRange)
        Constructor
        参数:
        owner - Creater of this explosion, defined its start location
        tNTMass - power of this explosion
        explosionRange - use to calculate the max expanding range of this explosion

      • move

        public void move()
        move method of this explosion it will expanding to max range during the duration time
